ncovmap 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • nCoV province map

ncov 2019

2020年02月29日

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.path = "man/figures/",
  message = FALSE
)

ncov 疫情图，参考ncovr, 具体使用详情见vignette. 暂放于此，后续可并入ncovr

数据来源

数据获取通过DXY-COVID-19-Crawler api 下载，调用get_ncov()即可获取。

安装

if (!require(remotes)) install.packages("remotes")
if (!require(ncovmap)) remotes::install_github("yiluheihei/ncovmap")
library(ncovmap)
library(leafletCN)

下载ncov数据

ncov <- get_ncov()
ncov
## COVID 2019 data
## Updated at 2020-02-29 07:14:20

提取省市或国家数据

# 中国数据
china <- ncov['china']
china
## # A tibble: 34 x 22
##    provinceName provinceShortNa… currentConfirme… confirmedCount suspectedCount
##    <chr>        <chr>                       <int>          <int>          <int>

hubei <- ncov['湖北省']

# 世界数据

国内总体疫情图

plot_china_map(china, legend_position = "bottomleft")
## Warning: Setting row names on a tibble is deprecated.

省份疫情图

湖北省

plot_province_map(
  hubei, 
  "湖北省", 
  bins = c(0, 100, 200, 500, 1000, 10000)
)
## Warning: Setting row names on a tibble is deprecated.

## Warning: Setting row names on a tibble is deprecated.

北京市

plot_province_map(
  beijing,
  "北京市", 
  bins = c(0, 10, 50, 100)
)
## Warning: Setting row names on a tibble is deprecated.

## Warning: Setting row names on a tibble is deprecated.

世界疫情图

plot_world_map(world, legend_position = "bottomleft")
